options.description: Input .out file from a Phobos search.
Debug level. Use a large number to turn on verbose debugging.
Output BSML file (will be created, or overwritten)
Project ID. Used in creating feature ids. Defaults to whatever the prefix of the input file is (i.e. spntigr4.assembly.1.1 would be spntigr4).
Required for creating feature identifiers. Each project should have its own id_repository directory - use the full path to it here.
